properties.title: Commandline tools for Web Service Testing

section.name: SoapUI CommandLine tools
section.p: soapUI currently comes with the following command line tools for running TestCases and LoadTests

tr.td: Runs specified TestCases and reports/exports results as configured
Runs specified LoadTests and reports/exports results as configured
Runs any of the configured Code Generation tools for specified project and interface
Allows execution of the above two from within a Maven 1.X/2.X build environment
